title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip').
4. Begin export to the zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up during the export process. The error message indicates that there are problems with the file of the same name in project 2 (e.g., 'foo.txt').
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories without encountering any issues.
SR:
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window.
2. Select both projects created earlier.
3. Give the zip file a name (such as 'test.zip').
4. Rename the file with the same name in project 2 to a different name (e.g., 'foo2.txt').
5. Begin export to the zip file.
